eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.helpers

Interface UndoHelper.OnActionListener

  • Enclosing class:
    UndoHelper

    public static interface UndoHelper.OnActionListener
    Since:
    30/04/2016 Creation in main package
    03/09/2017 Refactoring methods
    06/12/2017 Refactoring class name and methods

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onActionCanceled(int action, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> positions)
      Called when Undo event is triggered.
      void onActionConfirmed(int action, int event)

    • Method Detail

      • onActionCanceled

        void onActionCanceled(int action,
                      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> positions)
        Called when Undo event is triggered. Perform custom action after restoration.

        Usually for a delete restoration you should call FlexibleAdapter.restoreDeletedItems().

        Parameters:
        action - one of UndoHelper.Action.REMOVE, UndoHelper.Action.UPDATE
        positions - positions affected

      • onActionConfirmed

        void onActionConfirmed(int action,
                       int event)
        Called when Undo timeout is over and action must be committed in the user Database.

        Due to Java Generic, it's too complicated and not well manageable if we pass the List<T> object.
        So, to get deleted items, use FlexibleAdapter.getDeletedItems() from the implementation of this method.

        Parameters:
        action - one of UndoHelper.Action.REMOVE, UndoHelper.Action.UPDATE
        event - one of Snackbar.Callback#DISMISS_EVENT_SWIPE, Snackbar.Callback#DISMISS_EVENT_MANUAL, Snackbar.Callback#DISMISS_EVENT_TIMEOUT, Snackbar.Callback#DISMISS_EVENT_CONSECUTIVE
